moves.1. e4: HELLO and welcome back to another annotation fans,friends,followers,andWATCHERS!!!!!Your continued support in postive and negative input is appreciated.I know its been a couple days since i have annotated a game but just hold on faithful followers i will be back.Ok here we go,i open with e4
moves.1... e5: of course he answers will e5
moves.2... Qf6: Possibly trying to set me up for fools mate?
moves.4... Nd7: trying to bring queenside cowboy out
moves.5. Nc3: Bring out my last cowboy.I believe i am more developed.Notice his Queen just sitting there
moves.6. Bc4: Move back but not bad postion
moves.6... Bc5: Brings out bishop i believe hoping to attack my kingside
moves.7... Bd4: Attacking Nc3 and f2.But with no real back up
moves.8. Ne2 c5: He pushing a lot of pawns
moves.9. c3: Chain trying to stop,spook early rev
moves.9... Bxf2+: Yes this weakens castle wall but wasteful
moves.11. d4: The bodies are about to hit the floor.
moves.12. cxd4 exd4 13. Nexd4: Notice i elimanated his middle game
moves.16. Qc2: Trying set up some attack with Queen
moves.17. Qc7: Queen going for walk sacrifice holy man
moves.21. Qxb7 Bd3: Trying to scare rook so queen  can slip in and take king
moves.22. Rc7: Going in hot to enemy territory
moves.22... Ne7: Bringing his last cowboy to play
moves.24... Kf8: He senses that death is coming so King flees.King only going to be sweaty and tired when i catch him!
moves.26. Bxf6+: DANG! Jody done got his girl and gone.Life lesson here living alone enough she be gone
moves.29... Kh7: More running and boxing himself in
moves.31. Qg7#: ALAS  young Ulrich parting is such sweet sorry!BANG!!I hope you have enjoyed annotation.Please leave input postive or negative .I am trying to learnGOOD CHESS TO ALL!!!!!
